item.title: Trello example board - House Buying in the UK
item.description: Trello is one of my favourite tools for project planning and also time wasting - I guess you can spend hours planning your life (ha ha). I’ve put together a sample board for anyone wanting to use Trello to help manage their house purchase. It’s pretty specific for 1st time buyers / renters but you can adapt it.

item.title: 3 point plan for Agile Marketing
item.description: Can you tell the difference between Agile, Guerilla or Real Time Marketing? Does it really matter? You need a 3 point plan for Agile marketing – or is it just your boss asking for a quicker turn-around? What’s Agile marketing? Agile marketing is similar to real time marketing. So what makes it agile or is it a catchphrase? Agile marketing is a bit of a new catchphrase, you’ll see it in the press and hear it around the offices.
